## A simple map

```{r leaflet-1}
library(leaflet)
quakes %>% 
  head(50) %>% 
  leaflet() %>% 
  addTiles() %>% 
  addCircles()
```

## A map with a tooltip

```{r leaflet-2}
library(leaflet)
quakes %>% 
  head(50) %>% 
  leaflet() %>% 
  addTiles() %>% 
  addCircles(popup = ~str_c("Magnitude: ", mag))
```
